project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks users multiple-choice questions, keeps track of their scores, and displays the final score at the end.

task.name: Implement the structure for storing questions and answers in a variable
Design the user interface to ask multiple-choice questions
Implement functionality to keep track of the user's score during the quiz
Implement the logic to display the final score at the end of the quiz
Write tests for all implemented features
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure all functionality works correctly
